Package com.masri.TaskMangamentSystem.controller

Class ProjectController

java.lang.Object
com.masri.TaskMangamentSystem.controller.ProjectController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/projects") public class ProjectController extends Object
REST controller for handling operations related to projects.

      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the list of projects and HTTP status.

    • addProject

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> addProject(@RequestBody Project project)
      Adds a new project.
      Parameters:
      project - The project object to add.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with a success message and HTTP status.

    • getProjectById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getProjectById(@PathVariable int id)
      Retrieves a project by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the project to retrieve.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the project object or error message with HTTP status.

    • deleteProjectById

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> deleteProjectById(@PathVariable int id)
      Deletes a project by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the project to delete.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with a success message or error message with HTTP status.

    • addTaskToProject

      @PostMapping("/{id}/tasks") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> addTaskToProject(@PathVariable int id, @RequestBody Task task)
      Adds a task to a project by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the project to add the task to.
      task - The task object to add.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with a success message or error message with HTTP status.

    • updateTaskPriority

      @PutMapping("/{projectId}/tasks/{taskId}/priority") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> updateTaskPriority(@PathVariable int projectId, @PathVariable int taskId, @RequestBody UpdateDto priority)
      Updates the priority of a task within a project.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project containing the task.
      taskId - The ID of the task to update.
      priority - The updated priority information.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with a success message or error message with HTTP status.

    • updateTaskStatus

      @PutMapping("/{projectId}/tasks/{taskId}/status") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> updateTaskStatus(@PathVariable int projectId, @PathVariable int taskId, @RequestBody UpdateDto status)
      Updates the status of a task within a project.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project containing the task.
      taskId - The ID of the task to update.
      status - The updated status information.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with a success message or error message with HTTP status.

    • countTasksByStatus

      @GetMapping("/{projectId}/tasks/count") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> countTasksByStatus(@PathVariable int projectId)
      Retrieves counts of tasks by status within a project.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project to retrieve task counts from.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing task counts mapped by status or error message with HTTP status.

    • processAllTasks

      @PostMapping("{id}/process") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> processAllTasks(@PathVariable int id, @RequestBody Task task)
      Initiates processing of all tasks within a project.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the project containing tasks to process.
      task - The task object to process.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity indicating success or error with HTTP status.
